name: nexa-oper
description: Monorepo Nexa Oper com aplicações web, API e pacotes compartilhados

scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:generate && npm run build
scripts.setup:dev: npm run install:all && npm run db:generate && npm run dev
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all && npm run db:generate
scripts.reset:hard: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules && npm run install:all && npm run db:generate
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.help: echo '📜 Scripts disponíveis:' && echo '' && echo '🚀 Desenvolvimento:' && echo '  dev, build, lint, test, clean' && echo '' && echo '📦 Instalação:' && echo '  install:all, install:workspaces, install:web, install:api, install:db' && echo '' && echo '🗄️ Banco de Dados:' && echo '  db:generate, db:migrate:dev, db:migrate:deploy, db:studio, db:reset' && echo '' && echo '🌐 Aplicações:' && echo '  web:dev, web:build, web:start, api:dev, api:build, api:start' && echo '' && echo '🛠️ Setup:' && echo '  setup, setup:dev, reset, reset:hard' && echo '' && echo '🔍 Verificação:' && echo '  status, check, format, format:check' && echo '' && echo '🐳 Docker:' && echo '  docker:up, docker:down, docker:logs'
